name: Karen H. Kim, MD
address: SkinCare Physicians, 1244 Boylston Street, Suite 300, Chestnut Hill, MA 02467
description: Dr. Karen Kim is a board-certified dermatologist specializing in cosmetic dermatology, Mohs and laser surgery. She has been named a Top Doctor in Boston for six years

name: Kay Shou-Mei Kane, MD
address: SkinCare Physicians, 1244 Boylston Street, Suite 300, Chestnut Hill, MA 02467
description: Dr. Kay Shou-Mei Kane is a dermatologist serving the greater Boston area, specializing in pediatric dermatology. She has been named one of the Top Doctors of Boston for over 15 consecutive years

name: Miaoyuan M. Wang, MD
address: Integrated Dermatology of Brookline, 1000 Beacon Street, Suite 301, Brookline, MA 02446
phone: (617) 731-1600 (This number is also listed for SkinCare Physicians, suggesting a potential affiliation or shared administrative services.)
description: Dr. Miaoyuan Wang is a board-certified dermatologist specializing in diagnosing and treating all types of skin conditions, including Mohs micrographic surgery and aesthetic procedures

name: Dr. Hirotaka Akita
address: Massachusetts General Hospital, Wellman Center for Photomedicine, Boston, MA
description: Dr. Akita completed a research fellowship in Dermatology at Massachusetts General Hospital

name: Dr. Rie Takahashi
address: Oregon Dermatology, 1600 Valley River Way, Suite 100, Eugene, OR 97401 (Note: This is in Oregon, not Massachusetts, but she is of Japanese heritage and a prominent dermatologist.)
description: Dr. Takahashi is double board-certified in dermatology and Mohs micrographic surgery and has over 15 years of experience in skin cancer focus

name: Dr. Sally Tan, MD, MPH
address: Dermatology Associates of Concord, 1310 Beacon St, Brookline, MA 02446 (This address is for a Brookline location, but the practice also serves Cambridge and Waltham.)
description: Dr. Tan is a board-certified dermatologist serving the Cambridge, Concord, and Waltham areas

name: Dr. Shiri Nawrocki
address: The Dermatology Institute of Boston, 185 Dartmouth St, Suite 404, Boston, MA 02116
description: Dr. Nawrocki is a board-certified dermatologist with interests in acne, eczema, skin cancer, and cosmetic dermatology

name: Dr. Neelam A. Vashi, FAAD
address: The Dermatology Institute of Boston, 185 Dartmouth St, Suite 404, Boston, MA 02116
description: Dr. Vashi is a board-certified dermatologist with expertise in cosmetic dermatology, skin of color, and laser treatments. She is a former Director of the Boston University Cosmetic and Laser Center

name: Dr. Ali Al-Haseni, MD
address: The Dermatology Institute of Boston, 185 Dartmouth St, Suite 404, Boston, MA 02116
description: Dr. Al-Haseni is a board-certified dermatologist with specialty training in cutaneous oncology and expertise in skin cancer diagnosis and treatment

name: Dr. Thanh-Nga Tran
address: Kuchnir Dermatology, 1000 Washington St, Suite 200, Newton, MA 02456 (This is one of their locations; they have others.)
description: Dr. Tran is board-certified by the American Board of Dermatology and continues to serve on the faculty at Harvard Medical School
